org.linter
Class ServiceParser

java.lang.Object
  org.linter.ServiceParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
ServiceParserAlgorithmic, ServiceParserPartial
public abstract class ServiceParser
extends java.lang.Object

Parse meta data from a web page. abstract base class for all parsers

public abstract java.util.regex.Pattern getServicePattern()
Get the ServicePattern used to match the appropriateness of a ServiceParser for a particular URL

Returns:
Pattern used for determining appropriateness of ServiceParser for a URL

Parse meta data from raw HTML

Returns:
boolean true if successful

setRawContent

setSuccessor

public void setSuccessor(ServiceParser successor)
Set the successor ServiceParser for failure case or extracting additional meta data not provided by more specific parsers

Parameters:
successor - Next parser in the ServiceParser chain of responsibility

setRedirectUrlList

public void setRedirectUrlList(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> redirectUrlList)
Set the URL Redirection List for ServiceParsers that need access to all URLs leading to the final, resolved URL Sometimes useful for parsers that need to backtrack if the final, resolved URL requires login or is behind a paywall

Parameters:
redirectUrlList - List of all redirection URLs leading to current URL

parseWithSuccessor

protected boolean parseWithSuccessor()
Continue parsing with successor ServiceParser, if available Forwards all meta data to successor and merges back with itself on completion

Returns:
true if success, false if failed or end of chain
